document_name_accent: viem gan gap ngon tay cai.json
document_title: Thumb flexor tendonitis: Causes, symptoms, treatment
subsection_content: Thumb flexor tendonitis occurs due to inflammation of the tendon sheath in the finger, causing narrowing of the tendon sheath. In some cases, fibrous granules also appear in the tendon sheath, causing tendon movement through the fibrous granule location to be hindered. Every time the patient bends or extends the thumb, it is very difficult and limited. They have to try hard to pop the finger out or have to use the healthy hand to pull the finger out. (first)
subsection_title: viem gan gap ngon tay cai.json. What is thumb flexor tendonitis?
subsection_data:
viem gan gap ngon tay cai.json. What is thumb flexor tendonitis?
Thumb flexor tendonitis occurs due to inflammation of the tendon sheath in the finger, causing narrowing of the tendon sheath. In some cases, fibrous granules also appear in the tendon sheath, causing tendon movement through the fibrous granule location to be hindered. Every time the patient bends or extends the thumb, it is very difficult and limited. They have to try hard to pop the finger out or have to use the healthy hand to pull the finger out. (first)
